decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of the decision notice. Reason: To comply with the provisions of S.51 of the Planning & Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:Location PlanBlock Plan1237_203 Rev A1237_2041237_205 Rev AReason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Prior to the installation of the new gateways, elevational drawings detailing the brickwork to be cleaned, repaired, and repointed, detailed methodology for the proposed repair works along with details of the fixtures for the new gateways (not to be visible from public view) shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the Southgate Green Conservation Area.
description: Alterations to existing front fence to repair damaged brickwork involving repainting of picket fence and moulded timber posts, alterations to pedestrian and vehicular access and the installation of black painted metal gates.
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
